From the brand

Bamworld brings modern designs to transform your home that will surely space saving need for your home. In addition, we offers a variety of furniture for different families. We believe that quality material and unique design can get more customers love. so we design and produce different furniture for you to live a more comfortable and stylish life.

Large Plant Stand

Corner Plant Stand

Tall Plant Stand

【7 Pots Plant Stand】Unique design capable of holding 7 pot plants. The plant stand can be used as a decorative piece to organize your selection of plants. The stand is suitable for use indoors and outdoors.
【Durable And Sturdy】Wider width (12 inch) and clever use of the triangle stability principle makes the wood plant holder more stable.Also, plastic joints consolidate this plant stand.All of these give you more durable structure.
【Natural Wood With Carbonization】This plant rack is made of natural wood which underwent 1000 °F high temperature carbonization. Because of the carbonization process, no varnish or paint is required thus it is more safe for use and environmentally friendly
【Easy To Assemble】Explicit instruction and plastic joints make it easy to assemble. You may finish it within 15 minutes. We also offer you all tools may need.
【180 Days Worry-free Warranty】We offer 180 days warranty and 24h friendly customer service. If there are ever any issues about the product, please feel free to contact us and we will give you a free replacement or full refund.

item.title: Tomxcute Cat Water Fountain, 3.2L/108oz Automatic Stainless Steel Pet Fountain Dog Water Dispenser, Ultra-Quiet Pump and 3 Replacement Filters & for Cats, Dogs, Multiple Pets

item.content:encoded:
Price: $69.99 - $36.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:03:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

How did we get our start?

In 2016, a 5-person team with the same dream and determination founded Tomxcute. Today, we are a company that has more than 200 staff and owns over 6 departments with its products popularly sold in 10 different countries. By 2022, our sales volume has reached 5,000,000. This is where we get our start.

Click to Purchase Pet Supplies

Click to Purchase Pet Supplies

Tomxcute product accessories

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.46 x 8.46 x 3.94 inches; 1.83 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 0004-F
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ tomxcute
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09DSVFNRW

Double filtration system: Equipped with activated carbon filter and pre-filter sponge, the automatic cat and dog water fountain can provide your pet with pure drinking water and keep healthy.
3.2 L/108 Oz Large Capacity: The capacity of water fountain is 3.2L, and the high and low water level lines are marked in the container, and the effective volume is more than 3L, very suitable for multi-pet families.
Ultra-quiet: The 1.5W pump is super silent when running, keep it below 20db, only the sound of water flow can be heard, even if it runs at night, it will not affect your sleep.
Encourage Drinking : This cat water fountain is equipped with a faucet and spring surge modes which match Habits of drinking water under the tap of cats, dogs. The dynamic water flow helps attract pets to drink,which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Customer Support: For any questions, support or complaint, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem 24H.

Dual Filtration pet water fountain

Filter hair, debris and large particles, remove odor and impurities.Protect the drinking water health of pets such as cats and dogs.

Easy to clean

TOMXCUTE which can be washed by hand or machine washed in the dishwasher. It is recommended to clean once a week.

stainless steel pet fountain

our pet fountain is made of imported total 304 stainless,High grade Stainless Steel Drinking Fountain is unbreakable, durable and easy to clean

Read more

Sleep-like quiet

The noise level is less than 20 decibels, creating a more quiet and comfortable environment for you and your pet, No power consumption too much.

Large capacity

No matter where you go, you don’t have to worry about pet drinking water. 3.2L large-capacity pet water dispenser.

5.What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain, 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）, 1 x Pre-filter Sponge, 1 x DC Pump, 3 x Filters, 1 x Instruction Manual

Read more

According to the various behaviors of pets, the faucet type pet water dispenser is more favored by cats and dogs

Q: How often should I clean the drinking fountain?

A: We recommend cleaning the water dispenser every two weeks.

Q: How can I get the filters for 2-4week replacements?

A: We also sell the replacement filters online. If you have any questions, please feel free to find us.( 3 carbon filters included in the package of the cat fountain )

Q: How can I judge the water level in the drinking fountain?

A: Due to technical difficulty, it is not easy to provide a visible window for the stainless steel water dispenser, but we have marked the “MIN” and “MAX” lines in the water tank.

Q: What should I pay attention to about the pump?

A: Firstly, the pump should be cleaned every 2 week; then if the water level in the tank is too low, the water pump still keeps running and prone to fail. Please add water to the water tank in time.

Q: How long is the power cable?

A: The length of the cable is 180 cm.

Q. Noise Level Up ？

Check if it`s empty or water level drop below minimum, then refill the fountain under max level. Check if there are hairs blocking the impeller of the water pump.Sometimes the impeller was totally encrusted in calcium. Please clean the pump weekly to extend the life , and more importantly, it is healthier for pets to drink water.Any questions and concerns, please send message to us on Amazon, and we will give you a satisfied solution within 16 hours.

Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase

item.content:encoded:
Price: $21.99 - $16.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:24 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Drink happier and healthier

How did we get our start?

WOPET was founded in 2015 in CA,USA,JP,EU at the same time, our version that brings joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world.

Why do we love what we do?

WOPET team all love pets and technology and truly believe that every pet deserves a long and healthy life full of happiness and love.

What makes our products unique?

We are determined to create a boundless high-quality life for people with love and technology, and aimed at provide care for the value of life, and let pet owners get rid of the constraints of time and space.

W300 Cat Water Fountain

W500 pet fountain

Cat Water Fountain

Accessories for W300 and W300B

Automatic Pet Feeder

Boundless Love for Pets

WOPET vision is to bring joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world!

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.33 x 6.65 x 4.96 inches; 1.34 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ W300
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 21, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ WOPET
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B4NHRR6H
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Multiple Filtration：WOPET W300 pet water fountain has a triple filtration system. The sponge captures bulky contaminants like pet fur and debris. The ion exchange resin layer softens tap water, and the activated carbon removes nasty flavors and scents.Change the filter every 1 week will be more healthier!
BPA FREE & High-End Materials: Our W300 cat water fountain is BPA free, durable, and it’s easy to operate and clean,Make your pet fall in love with drinking water, no need to worry their health problem any longer.
Ultra-Quiet Pump: The pump is whisper-quiet and stays below 35 decibels. Low-voltage pump is reliable and usually lasts 2 years. The pump is detachable and replaceable.
Easy to Set Up and Clean: WOPET W300 cat drinking fountain is easy to assemble and disassemble for cleaning and replacement. Note：the pet fountain Doesn’t come with a wall plug. It is recommended to use a 5V, 1A adapter or power bank to operate it.


At WOpet, we all love pets and technology. Our vision is to bring joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world.




WOPET was founded in 2015 in USA,CA,JP,EU. Wopet will use its innovative scientific and technological capabilities and persistent sense of social responsibility to provide a more complete boundless pet loving experience for pet families around the world.

  • 2L Large Water Capacity
  • Dishwasher safe
  • Silent Running
  • User Manual*1
  • Brush*1
  • Filter*1

WOPET Pet Water Fountain is made of high quality ABS material, which is BPA-free, durable, safe and easy to assemble and clean.

2 Flow Designs could attract pets to drink more water.

Visible Water Level could check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

  • Please clean the water fountain every 3-4 days;
  • Please clean pumps every 2-4 weeks;
  • Please replace the filter every 2 weeks;
  • Please fill in water in time when the water level reaches Min.

Read more




Emergency Water Storage

With a water storage capacity of about 80ml, the water tray can still provide water for your pets when power outage occurs.

Visible Water Level

Check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

Two Drinking modes

Flower waterfall or gentle fountain let your pets to choose!

Read more



Cleaning the pump is essential to extend water fountain life and keep the water fresh. Please clean the pump at least every two weeks.

The steps of cleaning the pump

Step 1. Remove the sponge

Step 2. Remove the Pump Connector Rubber

Step 3. Remove the pump cover

Step 4. Remove the impeller

Step 5. Clean the parts with dish soap and warm water

Read more


Important Reminders:

1. For indoor use only!

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week. Especially the small grooves on the fountain can be cleaned every day. Small grooves are designed to filter impurities, allowing pets to drink healthier water.

3. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least the minimum level in the water bowl. The lowest water level is more than the water outlet of the pump.

4. According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, Change the filter every 1 week will be healthier!

5. Please keep the cable hidden to prevent pets from chewing it.

6. WOPET Never Authorized any sellers to sell official genuine filters. For your pet’s health and safety, please search “B0B5Q4N6Q2” to purchase the real WOPET W300 Filters,DO NOT use the cheap and pirated filters.

7.Make sure the filter is SOAKED, The water needs to flow through it and it will just spill over if the filter isn’t soaked thoroughly.

Product Model W300 W300 W500 F10 For W500&W300 For W500&W300
Material ABS ABS ABS Stainless Steel

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

From the manufacturer

BELKIN SURGE PROTECTOR

Direct Data Line Protection

* Adding to the 12 surge-protected outlets, the power strip features coaxial protection for your cable or satellite connections.

* With 1-in-2-out RJ11 input where you can directly plug in your telephone or fax machine to secure it against surges and voltage spikes.

Strong Surge Protection

Rated to withstand up to 3,940 joules, this surge suppressor is your premium power protection for your professional workstations, laser printers, broadband modems, and everyday household electronics.

Child Safety Sliding Locks

Each outlet has a sliding safety cover that closes when it is not in use. The covers also prevent dusts and other small particles from entering the socket.

Easily Fits in Different Areas

Equipped with a space-saving flat AC plug for enhanced flexibility and a durable 8 feet cord convenient for hard-to-reach wall receptacles.

Durable and Enduring Build

The Oversized Metal Oxide Varistors (MOVs) absorb excess electricity, and damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust while preventing dents and scratches.

Multi-Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip: Power everything on your desk with a single compact surge-protected extension cord. This reputable power cord offers 12 AC outlets with surge protector for charging your computer, laptop, phone, camera, and more. One charging station for a clutter-free desk.

Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.

Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.

Compact, Heavy Duty, and Space-Saving: The widely spaced outlets give ample area to fit big plugs and charger bricks. Its slender design makes it ideal for home office, workstations, and game rooms. The durable cord is 8 ft / 2.4 meters long with a 3-prong angle plug convenient for tight spaces.

Reliable Product and Service: Purchase with confidence. Check out the full specs: 6,000 volts maximum spike voltage, 15A AC, 125V, and 1875W. Each outlet has a safety slide lock to close unused sockets safeguarding you and your kids.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:46 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Choose SMALLRT, Choose Safety

SMALLRT is a comprehensive high-tech enterprise dedicated to the research and development, production and sales of sockets such as power strip, outlet extender, power strip tower.

SMALLRT power strip combine safety, practicality and aesthetics, and are suitable for various places such as office, home, hotel and so on.

A. How did we start?

The SMALLRT brand was founded in 2001. It combines safety, practicality and aesthetics. Once the power strip came out, it was favored by many consumers.

B. What makes our products unique?

We focus not only on safety but also on the practicality and aesthetics of our products. The power strip will also be tested at various levels before they leave the factory.

C. Why do we love what we do?

It is our founder’s goal to let everyone use SMALLRT power strip, and it is the work tenet of every SMALLRT person to make every consumer fall in love with our power strip.

【Overload Protection and Surge Protection 】The surge protector power strip will automatically cut power to protect your expensive devices when a voltage surge is detected. The reset/off switch with integrated circuit breaker for overload protection of all outlets. This outlets power strip has 8-overload protection.
【UL Approved Safe and Durable 】The 6FT upgraded extension cord with multiple outlets is UL approved and made of pure copper. Reinforced design at the junction of the stand of power strip tower and the wire head. To protect the terminal from wear and tear. Environmental protection and fire-resistance PC shell with flame retardant at 1382℉ makes it more durable and longer lifetime.
【USB- C Charge Up to 30% Faster 】4 USB ports total 3.4A, each USB A port features 2.4A Max output. USB C charging port features 3A Max. Built-in with smart technology, detecting charging devices and deliver optimal charging speed automatically, compatible with most USB devices.
【16 IN 1 Tower Power Strip with USB】- This power strip tower surge protector with 12 AC outlets and 4 smart USB (1 USB C) charging ports(5V/3.4A) can power up to 16 electronic devices simultaneously. Integrated circuit breaker and 1800 Joules protection rating ensure the safety of your electronics.
【What You will Get】 Power strip with USB ports, Maunal, our worry-free 12-month, our life time technology support and friendly customer service.The steady base with anti-slip mat on the bottom effectively avoid wobbling and slipping around.

In the event of power overload, the reliable safety switch will trip off automatically to protect your devices and your home. The switch on the base is designed to be perfectly loose, to ensure it won’t get stuck after long time of use. Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets is your best chose!

From the brand

Swipe through for more amazing products.

Click to Purchase Pet Supplies

Dog Grooming Kit

Click to Purchase Rug Pad

Click to Purchase Packing Cube

Click to Purchase Toilet Bidet

Veken is dedicated to bringing our customers premium, high-quality, and functional household products, pet supplies and travel accessories at reasonable prices.

Our vision is to continuously innovate and improve our products based on customer needs as well as current industry trends. Our customer centric approach means customers always come first.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.4 x 8.4 x 5.3 inches; 2.18 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ VK663
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Veken
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08NC54VZN
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

High-quality: Made of food grade materials, this drinking fountain is BPA free, durable, and easy to operate and clean. The water-level window and LED Light let you observe how much water your pets drink in real time, and lets you see exactly when you need to fill the water bowl. There is a switch on the wire to control the light so you could easily turn it on or off.
Two flow designs: The Veken Pet Fountain has 2 modes: flower waterfall (faucet drinking) and the gentle fountain. The water streaming down the petals of the flower on the fountain will draw your pets attention and encourage animals to drink more often.
Triple-filtration system: In addition to keeping water fresh via circulation, the triple-filtration system, including activated carbon layer, ion exchange resin and thick non-woven fabric, keeps water better tasting and safer for pets.
Ultra-quiet pump: The pump on this water dispenser is ultra-quiet, has low-energy consumption and will last 1.5-2 years.

Benefits of Choosing Us

Appeal to your pet’s natural instincts

In the wild running water is often safer to drink than still water and your pet knows that. A water bowl sitting out near their food could be unappealing. Cats and dogs are naturally attracted to running water being dispensed from a fountain, appealing to their natural instincts.

Your right-hand man in life

2.8L is suitable for multiple pet homes. The fountain is very easy to operate and clean. If you are looking for an advanced water fountain or your pet has any drinking problems, Veken will be the right choice for you and your pet.

The third water flow setting

You can remove the cap to form a flower bubble to increase the water flow for pets to drink. This fountain has various flow modes so its easy to find the option that is best for your pet. When placing the cap on the flower, make sure the ridge aligns with the notch on the flower.

Read more

What You Will Get:

  • 1 x Pet Water Fountain（8.3 x 8.3 x 6.6in）
  • 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）
  • 1 x DC Pump （with a 6ft power cord）
  • 2 x Filters
  • 1 x Pre-filter Sponge
  • 1 x Instruction Manual

Cleaning the pump is essential to the longevity of the fountain. Please clean the pump at least every 2 weeks.

Step 1. Remove the sponge

Step 2. Remove the pump cover

Step 3. Remove the impeller

Step 4. Clean the parts with dish soap and warm water

Read more





Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Replacement Filters 84oz Pet Fountain 100oz Pet Fountain Dog Grooming Kit 84oz Pet Fountain Replacement Pump

Important Reminders:

1. For indoor use only!

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week.

3. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least the minimum level in the water bowl.

4. To prevent the activated carbon dust (it will not harm your pets) from shedding, please soak the filter in water for 2 minutes and rinse it thoroughly under running water before use. It is recommended to flush the filter and sponge with water every time you change the water.

5. According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, replace the filter and the sponge every 2 to 3 weeks.

6. Please place the pump inside the square indention and make sure the double probe face towards the clear window in the water bowl.

7. Please keep the cable hidden to prevent pets from chewing it.

Product Description

Make Your Home Tidy and Organized

This portable D110 label maker with tape is different from the traditional label maker.

Designed in cute and compact style, it is lighter and smarter, and you can take it away to anywhere, and print anytime.

Print via Bluetooth with your iPhone & Android phone without requiring ink, and it makes your life more convenient and saves lots of money for you. (This label maker doesn’t work with computers or tablets)

Note: This app won’t collect your information or steal customer privacy.

If you are an Android user, you need to turn on location permission for searching Bluetooth devices to complete Bluetooth connection.

Google has strengthened users privacy policy, and requires users to open some access permission that need to enable the app since the version of the android phone was updated to 10.0.

Creating the stickers will be an interesting way to enrich your life!

Download the app, and then you can start an easy way to create your stickers.This app is safe and free, and it is compatible with Android & iOS systems.This app is free with more than 400+ templates, and you can choose different fonts and languages.Just make printing more interesting in your life.

Note:

1. This app won’t charge fee. If it reminded that you need to pay for it, that’s an advertisement of the app center, please just ignore it.

2. Connect the Bluetooth via app, but not on the phone system.

3. Skip the registration step if you don’t want to register an account. The account is used for saving the templates you created, and then you can find it easily when you log in next time.

Label Size is from 0.5inch to 0.6inch

Pure color label tapeCable label tapeRound white/ transparent label tapeRectangle transparent /white label tapeAll kinds of cartoons cute pattern label tape

Please Note that:

1. The Printer Output is Monochrome. It means it can only print black text. And if you would like to print color or pattern labels, you can buy some colored or pattern label tapes from our store or Amazon.

2. When install the paper, please make the label sticker side down.

3. Choose the right paper size on the app, the package included a 15x30mm white label tape.

Smart APP Control

Download the APP, Long press about 5s to turn on the printer Open the app and connect the Bluetooth via the appClick ‘+’ to create your labelsPrint your cute labels and stickers

High-quality Printing

High-quality durable labels, which are oil-proof, waterproof, and wipeable. Self-adhesive and can stick surfaces such as bottles and glass and files and so on. Besides, it is BPA-free, and it is a safe and healthy material, you can use it at any scene.

No Ink Needed, Save Your Money

Without requiring toner or ink, this label maker machine prints stickers 15-20mm/s. Besides, equipped with an advanced thermal head, this label sticker with tape is 203 dpi, and the stickers it prints are clear and nice.

Color
Pink Plant Marine Puppy Bubble

Size
1.2*3.1*5.3 inch 14x50mm 14x50mm 14x50mm 14x40mm

Label Quantity
Label maker machine with tape 130pcs/roll 130pcs/roll 130pcs/roll 160pcs/roll

D11 D11/D101/D110 D11/D101/D110 D11/D101/D110 D11/D101/D110

BPA FREE

✓

✓

✓

✓

✓

Advantage
Bluetooth & Portable & Cute Water-resistant & oil-resistant & strong adhesive Water-resistant & oil-resistant & strong adhesive Water-resistant & oil-resistant & strong adhesive Water-resistant & oil-resistant & strong adhesive

Smarter and Smaller-Compared with the traditional label makers, this portable label maker is smaller and smarter. Compact and lovely design and you can take it into your pocket, and print labels and stickers anytime, anywhere.
Bluetooth Connectivity & Easy to Use-This mini Bluetooth label printer prints stickers wirelessly. Just need to download the free app, and then it is easy to create custom labels in your way. The app included more than 60 +Fonts, 12+ Languages, and 400+ Borders. And it supports iOS & Android. (NOTE: This label maker doesn’t work with computers and tablet)
Multiple Creative Templates & A Great Chritmas Gift-This app of this stickers maker provides a variety of free templates, containing texts, tables, symbols, logos, barcodes, QR codes, images, time, insert Excel, etc. Small label size from 0.5inch to 0.6inch. Easy to create various cute and useful label stickers from your phone. Labels are fixed in length, not support continuous label tape. And Package included 15x30mm white label paper. You can buy one for your friends or famaily as a Chritmas gift, which makes Chritmas more funny!
Wide Application & Perfect for Thanksgiving Decorations- This label maker machines are used widely in organizing home supplies, classifying cosmetics items, price name jewelry tags, jar stickers, school and office files classification, storage, marking, etc. If you want to label some thanksgiving decorations, it is also a great choice!
High-Quality Printing- Equipped with a Japan thermal print head and 203 DPI, this handheld label maker prints fast and clearly. And this label maker machine with tape print inkless, and it is rechargeable, with a 1200 MAH Battery Life, saving your time and money.
